description: Details required for Condition 27 (CO2 Reductions - Internal Water Usage) of planning permission 20/00378/FUL (Application for Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Application 18/12928/FUL (Demolition of 20-30 Beaufort Road and 25-41 Fassett Road and hotel buildings to rear. Refurbishment and conversion of 18 and 32 Beaufort Road and 23 and 43 Fassett Road, and erection of new buildings to provide a total of 20 houses and 69 flats, together with basement and surface car parking and landscaping (Revision to planning permission15/12107/FUL) dated 19/09/2019 incorporating the addition of rear staircase core on Block D, Fassett Road).
